thread.title: Advantage Targets Travel Agents With a High Value Travel Agent Friendly Program
thread.title_full: Advantage Targets Travel Agents With a High Value Travel Agent Friendly Program

title: Advantage Targets Travel Agents With a High Value Travel Agent Friendly Program
text:
SOURCE: Advantage Rent A Car August 31, 2015 12:00 ET Advantage Targets Travel Agents With a High Value Travel Agent Friendly Program 
Advantage's Book Friendly Program Offers Free Days and More Free Days to Agents Just for Enrolling 
FORT LAUDERDALE, FL --(Marketwired - August 31, 2015) - Advantage Rent A Car, the fourth largest rent a car firm in the US, announced today that it has launched the Book Friendly Travel Agent Program and invites all travel agents to visit www.advantage.com/travelagents to enroll today. The Book Friendly Program rewards all those who enroll with a free rental day and double commission through the end of the year just for signing up. 
Book Friendly was designed from the ground up to help agents earn more money and provide the best possible value to their clients. The program is packed with benefits: Enroll now and get a free day you can use or give to a client Enroll now and get double commission for the rest of 2015 Earn more free days when you enroll your clients in the Instant Rewards Program , the most generous loyalty program in the travel industry Earn more free days when you enroll your business clients in the Advantage for Business program Plus when you enroll you get extra special benefits including Friends and Family discount codes 
The Book Friendly Program is Advantage's Way of Saying Thank You to Travel Professionals! Advantage is encouraging travel agents to sample its customer service, a new fleet and of course great rates. This combined with the Book Friendly program allows agents to earn more money and provide the best value to their clients. 
Agents can book with confidence because Advantage is a proud member of ASTA [American Society of Travel Agents] and a signatory of TACS [Travel Agent Commission Settlement]. 
Visit www.advantage.com/travelagents Today and Enroll in the Book Friendly Program 
About Advantage Rent A Car Advantage Rent A Car was founded in 1963 and is one of the leading rental car companies in the United States. The Catalyst Capital Group Inc., a private equity firm based in Toronto, Canada that manages over $5 billion in various funds, acquired the Advantage brand and related assets in 2014. Advantage now operates at 44 locations across the United States. The new Advantage features one of the industry's youngest, most diverse rental car fleets. The company also recently launched new growth initiatives including Advantage for Business, which offers a flat pricing structure with no black-out dates and the Instant Reward Program the most generous frequency/loyalty program in the travel industry. Both programs are targeted to frequent business travelers. Contact Information
